title: Super Soakers and Rocket Science
itunes:title: Super Soakers and Rocket Science
description:
How did a nuclear engineer end up inventing the Super Soaker water gun? This is the story of Lonnie Johnson, an inventor and engineer who, among many other things, revolutionized the backyard water pistol fight.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
How did a nuclear engineer end up inventing the Super Soaker water gun? This is the story of Lonnie Johnson, an inventor and engineer who, among many other things, revolutionized the backyard water pistol fight.

itunes:keywords: Lonnie Johnson, nuclear engineering, rocket science, NASA, Jet Propulsion Laboratory, Oak Ridge National Laboratory, Air Force, stealth bomber, Super Soaker, water gun, heat pump, heat exchange
